title: Haken - The Mountain (Limited Edition)  mp3  320k  a2k
description:
Haken - The Mountain (Limited Edition)  mp3  320k  a2k What we got....The Mountain is the third and most recently released album by British progressive metal band Haken. It was released 2 September 2013 through Inside Out Music. The first single from the album, "Atlas Stone", was released on 17 July. It is the last album to feature bassist Thomas MacLean.

Contents
Background and recording

Band members Richard Henshall and Charlie Griffiths said of the album:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“ 	To us, 'The Mountain' is symbolic of our journey as a band, but also reflects the wider trials and tribulations of life. Lyrically, we've done a lot of soul searching which has given the album an emotional depth that we're sure listeners will really relate to, whatever personal mountain they are climbing.
Musically, the new songs feel rawer and more emotional than anything we've created in the past. All the essential elements of our sound are still there but have been delivered in a more gritty and focused style. We've really pushed ourselves in all areas and truly believe that this album is a step up from any of our previous work... 	Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
